name: Dan Wheldon
introduction: Daniel Clive Wheldon (born 22 June 1978 in Emberton, Buckinghamshire, England, United Kingdom  16 October 2011 at Las Vegas Motor Speedway, near North Las Vegas, Nevada, United States) was a British racing driver who won the Indianapolis 500 in 2005 and 2011, along with the IndyCar title in 2005.
